ResetPersonalPIN.name: ResetPersonalPIN
ResetPersonalPIN.description:
Grants permission to reset the personal meeting PIN for the specified user on an Amazon
                                                Chime account

RestorePhoneNumber.name: RestorePhoneNumber
RestorePhoneNumber.description:
Grants permission to restore the specified phone number from the deltion queue back
                                                to the phone number inventory

RetrieveDataExports.name: RetrieveDataExports
RetrieveDataExports.description:
Grants permission to download the file containing links to all user attachments returned
                                                as part of the "Request attachments" action

SearchAvailablePhoneNumbers.name: SearchAvailablePhoneNumbers
SearchAvailablePhoneNumbers.description: Grants permission to search phone numbers that can be ordered from the carrier

SendChannelMessage.name: SendChannelMessage
SendChannelMessage.description:
Grants permission to send a message to a particular channel that the member is a part
                                                of

StartDataExport.name: StartDataExport
StartDataExport.description: Grants permission to submit the "Request attachments" request

SubmitSupportRequest.name: SubmitSupportRequest
SubmitSupportRequest.description: Grants permission to submit a customer service support request

SuspendUsers.name: SuspendUsers
SuspendUsers.description: Grants permission to suspend users from an Amazon Chime Enterprise account

TagAttendee.name: TagAttendee
TagAttendee.description: Grants permission to apply the specified tags to the specified Amazon Chime SDK attendee

TagMeeting.name: TagMeeting
TagMeeting.description: Grants permission to apply the specified tags to the specified Amazon Chime SDK meeting.

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to apply the specified tags to the specified Amazon Chime resource.

UnauthorizeDirectory.name: UnauthorizeDirectory
UnauthorizeDirectory.description:
Grants permission to unauthorize an Active Directory from your Amazon Chime Enterprise
                                                account

UntagAttendee.name: UntagAttendee
UntagAttendee.description:
Grants permission to untag the specified tags from the specified Amazon Chime SDK
                                                attendee.

UntagMeeting.name: UntagMeeting
UntagMeeting.description:
Grants permission to untag the specified tags from the specified Amazon Chime SDK
                                                meeting.

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to untag the specified tags from the specified Amazon Chime resource.

UpdateAccount.name: UpdateAccount
UpdateAccount.description: Grants permission to update account details for the specified Amazon Chime account

UpdateAccountOpenIdConfig.name: UpdateAccountOpenIdConfig
UpdateAccountOpenIdConfig.description: Grants permission to update the OpenIdConfig attributes for your Amazon Chime account

UpdateAccountResource.name: UpdateAccountResource
UpdateAccountResource.description: Grants permission to update the account resource in your Amazon Chime account

UpdateAccountSettings.name: UpdateAccountSettings
UpdateAccountSettings.description: Grants permission to update the settings for the specified Amazon Chime account

UpdateAppInstance.name: UpdateAppInstance
UpdateAppInstance.description: Grants permission to update AppInstance metadata

UpdateAppInstanceUser.name: UpdateAppInstanceUser
UpdateAppInstanceUser.description: Grants permission to update the details for an AppInstanceUser

UpdateBot.name: UpdateBot
UpdateBot.description: Grants permission to update the status of the specified bot

UpdateCDRSettings.name: UpdateCDRSettings
UpdateCDRSettings.description: Grants permission to update your Call Detail Record S3 bucket

UpdateChannel.name: UpdateChannel
UpdateChannel.description: Grants permission to update a channel's attributes

UpdateChannelMessage.name: UpdateChannelMessage
UpdateChannelMessage.description: Grants permission to update the content of a message

UpdateChannelReadMarker.name: UpdateChannelReadMarker
UpdateChannelReadMarker.description:
Grants permission to set the timestamp to the point when a user last read messages
                                                in a channel

UpdateGlobalSettings.name: UpdateGlobalSettings
UpdateGlobalSettings.description:
Grants permission to update the global settings related to Amazon Chime for the AWS
                                                account

UpdatePhoneNumber.name: UpdatePhoneNumber
UpdatePhoneNumber.description: Grants permission to update phone number details for the specified phone number

UpdatePhoneNumberSettings.name: UpdatePhoneNumberSettings
UpdatePhoneNumberSettings.description:
Grants permission to update phone number settings related to Amazon Chime for the
                                                AWS account

UpdateProxySession.name: UpdateProxySession
UpdateProxySession.description: Grants permission to update a proxy session for the specified Amazon Chime Voice Connector

UpdateRoom.name: UpdateRoom
UpdateRoom.description: Grants permission to update a room

UpdateRoomMembership.name: UpdateRoomMembership
UpdateRoomMembership.description: Grants permission to update room membership role

UpdateSipMediaApplication.name: UpdateSipMediaApplication
UpdateSipMediaApplication.description:
Grants permission to update properties of Amazon Chime SIP media application under
                                                the administrator's AWS account

UpdateSipMediaApplicationCall.name: UpdateSipMediaApplicationCall
UpdateSipMediaApplicationCall.description:
Grants permission to update an Amazon Chime SIP media application call under the administrator's
                                                AWS account

UpdateSipRule.name: UpdateSipRule
UpdateSipRule.description:
Grants permission to update properties of Amazon Chime SIP rule under the administrator's
                                                AWS account

UpdateSupportedLicenses.name: UpdateSupportedLicenses
UpdateSupportedLicenses.description:
Grants permission to update the supported license tiers available for users in your
                                                Amazon Chime account

UpdateUser.name: UpdateUser
UpdateUser.description: Grants permission to update user details for a specified user ID

UpdateUserLicenses.name: UpdateUserLicenses
UpdateUserLicenses.description: Grants permission to update the licenses for your Amazon Chime users

UpdateUserSettings.name: UpdateUserSettings
UpdateUserSettings.description: Grants permission to update user settings related to the specified Amazon Chime user

UpdateVoiceConnector.name: UpdateVoiceConnector
UpdateVoiceConnector.description:
Grants permission to update Amazon Chime Voice Connector details for the specified
                                                Amazon Chime Voice Connector

UpdateVoiceConnectorGroup.name: UpdateVoiceConnectorGroup
UpdateVoiceConnectorGroup.description:
Grants permission to update Amazon Chime Voice Connector Group details for the specified
                                                Amazon Chime Voice Connector Group

ValidateAccountResource.name: ValidateAccountResource
ValidateAccountResource.description: Grants permission to validate the account resource in your Amazon Chime account
